story.title: Echoes of the Past
story.logline: A hardened detective uncovers clues linking a cold case to his own haunting history.

perspectives.storytelling: John is a seasoned detective whose past is as mysterious as the cases he solves.

players.name: Detective John Marlowe
players.visual: A rumpled trench coat and tired eyes that miss nothing.
players.audio: Measured speech with an edge of impatience.
players.summary: A dedicated detective haunted by unresolved cases.
players.storytelling: John exudes a stoic demeanor, masking the inner turmoil of his past.

dynamics.summary: The case concludes with John uncovering the truth.
dynamics.storytelling: A climactic moment of revelation that ties together past and present.

storypoints.illustration: John ponders over a crucial piece of evidence.
storypoints.summary: A turning point in the investigation where personal history intersects with the case.
storypoints.storytelling: The discovery of an old photograph sparks memories and hidden truths.

storybeats.summary: A moment where the past resurfaces, influencing his current investigation.
storybeats.storytelling: A blend of present-day tension and haunting memories creates a surreal experience.

overviews.label: logline
overviews.summary: A dark and atmospheric mystery unfolds in a rain-soaked city.
overviews.storytelling: The narrative juxtaposes gritty realism with introspective flashbacks.

overviews.label: genre_dynamics
overviews.summary: Mystery pacing with thriller turns built on memory and regret.
overviews.storytelling: Each reveal tightens the emotional stakes as the genre shifts between introspection and pursuit.

moments.synopsis: John uncovers an old case file that hints at deeper connections to his own past.
moments.setting: A dimly lit precinct archive room.
moments.imperatives: Investigate the link before the evidence disappears.
